segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman looks while the sink is flooding the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge, and she doesn’t even blink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy balancing on that stool, and it looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to regret not paying attention soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes are stacked neatly, but the floor is a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the sunlight coming through the window, making everything look so normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, I’m afraid he’s going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems so innocent, just waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman even knows the kids are behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
